archimate:Contract.name: Standards of Good Practice (SOGP) by ISF
archimate:Contract.documentation: The Standards of Good Practice (SOGP) by ISF is a contractual document that outlines a set of guidelines and best practices for organizations to follow. It provides a framework for ensuring security, risk management, and compliance in various business domains. The SOGP covers areas such as information security, incident management, business continuity, and data protection. It serves as a valuable resource for organizations seeking to establish and maintain a robust security posture. The document includes detailed procedures, policies, and controls that can be implemented to mitigate risks and safeguard critical assets.
